group_1.narration: I want the one I love to love me back.
It was only natural I try approaching him.@Try being the main word...

group_1.textRight: Aimi, we're off to the arcade! Wanna come?

group_1.textLeft: [chara:302301:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]What, really? Are you sure? [chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_1][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_011.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]I'll go!@I'm definitely going!

group_1.narration: We hung out a bunch in the same group and@seemed to get along fine.
Or at least, I thought we did...

group_1.textLeft: Oh, darn it! This crane game is way too hard!

group_1.textRight: Oh, do you want that prize, Aimi?

group_1.textLeft: Oh... Um... [chara:302301:lipSynch_0][wait:0.8][chara:302301:cheek_1][chara:302301:motion_300][chara:302301:face_mtn_ex_030.exp.json][chara:302301:lipSynch_1]I mean... Yeah, I...I think? @Maybe...

group_1.narration: I got so nervous, I couldn't speak clearly@at all.

group_1.textLeft: Though I guess I've never gotten used to@talking with boys in the first place.

group_1.textRight: Ah! I think I get it.
I'm not good at talking to guys either,@unless they're on my baseball team.

group_1.textLeft: It's why I haven't been able to approach him@since then.
But I still wanted to figure out what he@thought about me.
Hey, do you know if Hayato has a girlfriend?

group_1.textRight: Girlfriend? No, I don't think he's going out@with anyone yet.

group_1.textLeft: Not "yet"?! Does he have someone he likes,@then?!

group_1.narration: Does that mean I should be supportive?!
No, wait, wait, wait.@It's not like they're dating...
Maybe I still have a chance?
So probably...@I didn't have a chance to begin with?

group_1.textLeft: I did get some info, but it just made me@worry more.
And that was when I met him...
